ch0181_00_trova/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I knew you’d
show up soon!
ch0181_00_trova/0101_0701_02_10:
To put it another way, I was hoping that
you’d come!
ch0181_00_trova/7101_0701_02_10:
There’s always something new to learn about
them that makes you want to keep uncovering
their mysteries.
ch0181_00_trova/7102_0701_01_10:
I used to travel around Kalos in hopes of
completing my Pokédex.
ch0181_00_trova/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s a bit of a shame that there aren’t any wild
Pokémon on Pasio.
ch0181_00_trova/7102_0701_03_10:
So instead, I’ve been taking notes on my memories
and thoughts after my battles.
ch0181_00_trova/7103_0701_02_10:
I want to connect with my opponents and other
Pokémon on a deeper level through battling.
ch0181_00_trova/7103_0701_03_10:
I’ve been wanting to do that again ever since I
started battling more on Pasio!
ch0181_00_trova/7104_0701_02_10:
But I feel like I became a little more courageous
after I explored Kalos.
ch0181_00_trova/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you mind being called by a nickname,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0181_00_trova/7105_0701_02_10:
If you’d like, I can come up with a nickname for
you sometime!
ch0181_00_trova/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, uh... Do take this, won’t you?
ch0181_00_trova/1701_0702_01_10: I think it’ll come in handy!
ch0181_00_trova/2501_0701_01_10:
Seeing different sync pairs made me realize that
every Pokémon has its own unique character.
ch0181_00_trova/2501_0701_02_10:
Once I’ve completed my Pokédex, I want to
investigate the changes that happen when people
and Pokémon interact with each other.
ch0181_00_trova/2501_0701_03_10:
To put it another way, I want to investigate the
bonds between people and Pokémon!
ch0181_00_trova/2501_0702_01_10:
Lately, I’ve been thinking about becoming a
Pokémon Professor.
ch0181_00_trova/2501_0702_02_10:
I know there’ll be a lot of competition, and since
I’m still studying, there’s still a long road
ahead of me...
ch0181_00_trova/2511_0701_01_10:
Um... Did you happen to meet my parents
on Pasio?
ch0181_00_trova/2511_0701_02_10:
They’re currently traveling around the world to
train their Pokémon...
ch0181_00_trova/2511_0701_03_10:
So, I was wondering if they might’ve also come
to Pasio...
ch0181_00_trova/2511_0702_01_10: My parents inspired me to travel all over Kalos.
ch0181_00_trova/2511_0702_02_10:
But my sister wasn’t very happy with us
being away from home. I wonder how she’s
doing now...
ch0181_00_trova/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s compare how many sync pairs we’re each
able to meet today! It’s my own kind of battle.
ch0181_00_trova/3003_0701_01_10:
Instead of wild Pokémon, I’ve been observing sync
pairs. I might learn something that helps me out
in battle.
ch0181_00_trova/3005_0701_01_10:
I’ve finished with everything I needed to do today.
To put it another way, I need to rest up to
prepare for tomorrow.
